description:
VERSION: check in a version file for the development branch
That way "go version" will talk about "devel" rather than weekly.2012-03-27

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e82d9f8685d8 ***

VERSION: check in a version file for the development branch
That way "go version" will talk about "devel" rather than weekly.2012-03-27

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6478061

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

(If we start issuing weeklies in the run up to Go 1.1 we can always
remove this.)

subject: code review 6478061: VERSION: check in a version file for the development branch
